title: How to Make Microwaved Lasagna

steps.headline: Cook and stir ground beef in large saucepan until meat is brown.
Add 2 small jars of spaghetti sauce.
steps.description: Heat to boiling, while stirring occasionally.

steps.headline: Reduce heat and let it simmer for 10-15 minutes.
While sauce is simmering cook lasagna noodles according to package directions and drain.
Mix cottage cheese and 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese.
In a glass pan, 13x9x2 inches, layer 1/4 each of noodles, remaining meat sauce, the mozzarella cheese and cottage cheese mixture; repeat that 3 times.
Spread reserved meat sauce over top; sprinkle with 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese.
Set microwave on high and cook for 20-25 minutes.
Let sit 10-15 minutes after removing from the microwave and its ready to eat.

tyn: The ingredients you will need are the following: 1 pound of ground beef, 2 small jars of spaghetti sauce, 3 cups of creamed cottage cheese, 1 cup of grated Parmesan cheese separated, 1  package (8 ounces) lasagna noodles cooked and well drained, 3/4 pound of mozzarella cheese shredded.
text: Cook and stir ground beef in large saucepan until meat is brown. Drain off all the fat. Add 2 small jars of spaghetti sauce. Heat to boiling, while stirring occasionally. Reduce heat and let it simmer for 10-15 minutes.  While sauce is simmering cook lasagna noodles according to package directions and drain.  Mix cottage cheese and 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese.  In a glass pan, 13x9x2 inches, layer 1/4 each of noodles, remaining meat sauce, the mozzarella cheese and cottage cheese mixture; repeat that 3 times.  Spread reserved meat sauce over top; sprinkle with 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese. Cover with plastic rap. Set microwave on high and cook for 20-25 minutes.  Let sit 10-15 minutes after removing from the microwave and its ready to eat.
sentences: Cook and stir ground beef in large saucepan until meat is brown.
Add 2 small jars of spaghetti sauce.
Heat to boiling, while stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat and let it simmer for 10-15 minutes.
While sauce is simmering cook lasagna noodles according to package directions and drain.
Mix cottage cheese and 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese.
In a glass pan, 13x9x2 inches, layer 1/4 each of noodles, remaining meat sauce, the mozzarella cheese and cottage cheese mixture; repeat that 3 times.
Spread reserved meat sauce over top; sprinkle with 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese.
Set microwave on high and cook for 20-25 minutes.
Let sit 10-15 minutes after removing from the microwave and its ready to eat.
